code: import React from'react';import{makeStyles}from'@material-ui/core/styles';import Avatar from'@material-ui/core/Avatar';var AvatarImage=function AvatarImage(props){var useStyles=makeStyles(function(theme){return{size:{width:theme.spacing(props.size),height:theme.spacing(props.size)}};});var classes=useStyles();return React.createElement(Avatar,{alt:"".concat(props.name," Avatar"),src:props.avatar,className:classes.size});};export default AvatarImage;
